title: Hollywood Diet & Exercise Secrets
description: Have you ever wondered how the Hollywood celebrities keep so thin and trim and still have all that energy?The answers are here in this quick handbook. Hollywood Diet & Exercise Secrets reveals 40 different personal routines that really work, from the stars themselves! From food and liquid intake, to vitamins and daily exercise routines, the celebrities share their opinionated views and beliefs for maintaining their excellent health.Stay fit and trim all year round, by following or incorporating the stars’ secrets into your diet and exercise plan.Some of the 40 celebrities’ diet & exercise secrets are from: Bo Derek, Harrison Ford, La Toya Jackson, David Hasselhoff, Cassandra Peterson (Elvira), Donny Osmond, Vanna White, Richard Simmons, Mary Hart, Lorenzo Lamas and many, many more.Secrets that work and have worked beautifully for the Hollywood celebrities and now… you too!
author: Jay   Christian
